titles.title: A bill to abolish the Federal Insurance Office of the Department of the Treasury, and for other purposes.
Federal Insurance Office Abolishment Act of 2019
Federal Insurance Office Abolishment Act of 2019
Federal Insurance Office Abolishment Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Federal Insurance Office Abolishment Act of 2019
This bill eliminates the Federal Insurance Office (FIO) within the Department of the Treasury. The bill also removes the FIO director as a nonvoting member of the Financial Stability Oversight Council.
